mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}S_ID as "${columnPrefix}id", ${tableAlias}S_TEMPLATEID as "${columnPrefix}templateId", ${tableAlias}I_LEFTUP as "${columnPrefix}leftUp", ${tableAlias}I_LEFTDOWN as "${columnPrefix}leftDown", ${tableAlias}I_RIGHTUP as "${columnPrefix}rightUp", ${tableAlias}I_RIGHTDOWN as "${columnPrefix}rightDown", ${tableAlias}S_TYPE as "${columnPrefix}type", ${tableAlias}I_NUMBER as "${columnPrefix}number"
